title: Sketchbook Folio, "Quick Sketch of Distant Mountains with Small Island", 1885–1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
dimensions:
7 x 11.5 cm (2 3/4 x 4 1/2 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.5 x 19 cm (4 15/16 x 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: In foreground, possibly the ocean or a lake with a small island at left-center in middleground. Across water, in distance, a two-peaked mountain range.
